name: Importance of intellectual property protection to companies that performed or funded R&D, by type: 2018
description: Importance of intellectual property protection to companies that performed or funded R&D, by type: 2018

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to 100% because of rounding. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States with at least 10 employees that performed or funded $50,000 or more of R&D.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, Business Research and Development Survey, 2018.
